patthana14.30:4.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:5.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.30:6.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana14.30:7.1: Savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:8.1: Avicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.30:9.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
